name: The Lurker (MasterPindu)
description:
First game jam. please comment bugs if you find any :). Your blood will go down every second - gain blood from pickups and killing enemies. AVOID LIGHT.  WASD for movement,  E to Kill enemy (from behind and gain blood). 

REMEMBER - YOU CAN KILL ENEMIES FROM BEHIND :)

ENEMY LIGHT WILL DRAIN YOUR BLOOD INSTANTLY TO 0 AND KILL YOU

Download the project and the .exe file name is "2022.1.4f1[TILE MAP TEST]" I was unable to change the name since it was supposed to be a tile map test but instead I turned it into a game. Credits also to the asset creators and my friend who helped me make this game.
